message: The internet has given criminals an avenue to commit these crimes, and certain websites are knowingly facilitating their activities as part of an organized network. Compounding the issue, smart phones make it easier for traffickers to complete transactions.

data.description: Human trafficking is one of the fastest growing criminal enterprises in the world. More than 20 million people in our nation, and around the globe, are subjected to this modern
data.title: Fischer on the Stop Enabling Online Sex Trafficking Act
